159mm Flush Glaze / Seismic Frames
Details
Factory QA
Correct packings and sufficient at fixings
Seismic frame installed, confirm correct fixings and oversealed
Install 228157 sub sill into sismic sill tray. Main M14 sill fixings, and over seal. Install Gutter Sleeve with correct fixing and seals.
Check steel box stiffener (75 x 50 x 6mm) is inserted into mullions correctly
Check mullion hanger brackets are securly bolted to mullions and over sealed
Insert frame installed correctly, and wedged off
Install S/S head angle bracket to head at each mullion with M12 x 150 screwsand over seal
External - sealants and air seals installed correctly with perf rod
Internal - sealants and air seals installed correctly with perf rod
Commercial Doors fited
Hardware installed and operational
Level 2 steel hanger brackets bolted to slab and alinginded correctely

Upper level aluminium hanger brackets alingened correctly and fixed off
Glazing completed correct to specification including wedging were required
External flashings installed correctly with all fixings over sealed
